review: Doctor answers every query keenly and priovides a lot of morale support. She has huge amount of experience in he field which gives her an upper hand. I would recommend  Dr Mala Prakash anytime

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She understood & diagnosed the problem very well due to her many years  experience  & provided satisfactory solution.
She is calm , patient , approachable & very reliable. Felt free to ask questions for which she gave satisfactory answer  which helped us to decide about the treatment.

I am not one of those who visits doctors so often. But I am a strong believer in giving recognition where the service has provided excellently. She was so nice, calming and was able to answer all my questions. I was put at total ease and Dr Mala Prakash told me she would even inform me about a  single thing about my treatment. she was so kind to me.

Dr Mala prakash was by far the best gynecologist I ever had. I saw her for  some some sort of treatment.I saw her for routine checkups. She is excellent in all ways: intelligent, kind, patient, and very skilled in the exam. She really knows what she is doing and does it with a minimum of discomfort to the patient.She should train legions to follow in her footsteps.

Genuinely caring person, very knowledgeable and professional. I can't think of anybody with whom I can discuss so easily all my concerns and worries. She is very sympathetic and gets excited together with me looking at the ultrasound pictures. I feel lucky to have found her.She is a great doctor. I was so happy when I found her.She is near to my place too so its easy to visit her when required. only the concern is some time there is high crowd that time you have to wait for long time.

:Waiting is a issue:-

We consulted Dr Mala for treatments of my wife. My wife was suffering from stomach pain. I had a very bad experience of waiting in the clinic. We took appointment for 6 PM slot and when we reached there clinical staff said that the doctor visits clinic only after 7.30 PM. We were forced to wait for a long period.

The consultation fee online was 400 INR, but when we visit clinic doctor charges 500 INR. This consultation fee is really very expensive. Added to this whatever procedures are performed at the clinic and whatever charges are taken, they wont give a single receipt to us. All are hand written receipts. Which wont be of use.

They have a good staff and clinical environment too. Doctor is experienced enough to listen to the problems and analyse the same and help patients solve them at quickly. Doctor prescribed a set of medicines to my wife. After completion of the course of medicines my wife got cured and we are happy with the doctor treatment.

It would be better if waiting time and fee is reduced a bit and if they give printed receipts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Please do not visit this doctor.
I had been seeing her from the start of my pregnancy.  At the last moment I was told that doctor Mala will not deliver my baby. Only her team will be there.

She does not give you her number no matter the emergency. I had fallen right on my stomach and had to go to the hospital, still the doctor did not give her number in case of emergency.

If you start asking a lot of questions especially if you are a first time mother, your questions will not be entertained. 

If you get late to the clinic even by 5-10 minutes, their receptionist will make a hullabaloo and you will be asked to reschedule.

I was forced for an internal checkup. There was no consent. And I was told that how will I manage labour pain if I can’t handle the internal check up. 

The doctor was all pro normal delivery from the start but changed at the last moment.  The doctor pressurised to get an elective c section to be done in week 37 and the reason given to me was that in corona, they don’t want to wait for natural labour pain to start. And in case I opt for normal delivery, and if the pains can start anytime, they will deliver my baby in the covid section of Apollo hospital Bannerghatta even though I would be covid negative. My pregnancy was super smooth. I am not on the heavy side also. All normal. 

I immediately changed my doctor *** *** *** ******** **** **** **** ****** ** ***** ** ***** **** ** **** ******** *** * ****** ****** **** ********** ** **** ** *** ** * ****** ** * ********* ******* *** ****** *** ****** ** ****** ** ****** ** *** **** ****** *** ** *** *** ***** ******** **** * ***** 
DO NOT WATSE YOUR TIME AND MONEY AND MENTAL PEACE.

:Good doctor:-

I consulted Dr. Mala Prakash for my general checkups done. Doctor is very good and she speaks up to the point. She listens to the patients with lot of patience and after analyzing the issue she will explain you all the necessary precautions to be taken to avoid the same problem in future.

Usually patient would prefer doctor who speaks a lot, but prefer who speaks to the point. I had a good experience with the doctor. She has a good clinic and well planned amenities for the patients.

But the worst part is waiting period, which usually is too much as there will be huge crowd of patients at the clinic. Doctor has cleared my problems.

She has prescribed me few medicines and did not perform any unnecessary test or examinations.Now my issue is resolved and i am healthy. I would recommend this doctor to my friends, family and others also.

The clinic is very clean and tidy with the best staff, who behave politely. I would rate 4.9 to this doctor 5 being the highest. One of the best gynecologist i have ever visited.

-:Good doctor but less experienced nurse:-

Me and my wife visited Dr Mala Prakash for our personal problems. Doctor is good in treatment and we are happy for the same. Usually there will be a waiting of 30 mins. In our first visit we were waiting for thirty minutes, later in follow up appointments the waiting period increased to one hour and sometimes more than that.

Though the doctor is good the nursing staff whom seems to be old enough is not at all good. She is very careless in performing procedures. We once went to doctor's own clinic (MN Speciality Clinic) to inject drips to my wife as she was suffering from weakness. The nursing staff at the clinic injected so hard that my wife got hurt because of that and the wound went on for many days.

Just because of this we never go to doctor's clinic, instead we go to other places where the same doctor practices. We visit same doctor at different places just because doctor is very good.

Also the consultation fee which doctor charges is very high and it might me difficult for middle class people afford the same.

One of my friend booked appointment for me with Dr. Mala Prakash . I went to Doctor for consultation on my gynecology problems. I had a very bad experience over there. I took appointment for 7.30 PM slot but i was treated by 9.15 PM. When i visited the clinic there were female who were 4 months 6 months and 8 months carrying. A man whose wife was carrying around 8 months was waiting from around 4 PM, he repeatedly asked the doctor to take them on priority, still doctor nor the staff cared about the mother. She never cares her patients.

When it comes to my issue, i had problems with my regular periods, doctor did not even listen to my problem, she randomly prescribed me few medicines, which were too expensive. Her consultation fee (500 INR ) is also too high, added to this no receipt was given for the same. The tablets (which very high dosage tablets) were prescribed for a period of 10 days.

After consuming tablets for 2 days i was feeling very uneasy in my health. Hence i consulted another doctor who suggested me to stop the intake of those tablets as they were not the right tablets that should be prescribed for my problem.

I had checked on internet about my issue, all i got was in such case doctor should perform blood test for thyroid or hemoglobin imbalance or scanning to for other issue, than only they should prescribe the tablets, but nothing like that was done by the doctor. She blindly prescribed tablets.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: We have been consulting Dr. Mala Prakash since Sept 2018 and our advice would be to avoid visiting her or the Apollo Hospitals *** ***************** ******* Whenever we booked the appointment with Dr. Mala Prakash, she would never make herself available and we would be forced to see her team member Dr. Tanuja. We have been getting all the scans/tests done as per their suggestion, costing more than 30-40K. My wife had a family function to attend and hence she went to get a medical certificate from Dr. Mala so that she can fly. Her pregnancy is only 25 weeks old, still, we thought it would be better to get a medical certificate. They have been telling us that everything is normal, except that Placenta placement being low (which she said would adjust during the course of time). On being told she needs to fly, everything changed and they started saying the situation is serious and hence we cant advise her to fly etc. Maybe she thought we are taking her to some other hospital at our native place for treatment, which they want to discourage. Because of this, we had to look at other gynaec at the last moment. ***** **** *** *** *** **** *** **** ** ************** ****** ******* **** ***** ************* *** ******* ****** ** ******** ********* **** ** ***** ******** Due to her rude behavior, Apollo hospital is going to lose one family as a customer from now onwards.

We consulted Doctor for Pregnancy checkups and Normal Delivery. Faced 2 issues with her advice. 
1. Before the due date, on the 38th week we went to check for a leak as we observed some watery leak.  *** ******* ********* ** ** * ***** ***** *** asked us to admit for the delivery. However,  we saw no water leak thereafter and had to reject the delivery.  *** ****** ***** **** ******* *** ********* ****** *** ******** ** ***** *** ****** * **** ****** ****** **** * *** *********  
2.  My wife was doing good without any complications. On the 40th week, the doctor asked us to take the elective induction for Normal delivery. why? She didnt explain us the effectiveness of induction nor she informed us about the success rate of the induction . *** ***** **** ******* ****** **** ** ***** *** ****** ******** * We believed that Doctor will be able to successfully induce and do normal delivery. But it was not the case . On the day of induction they did the induction for just 3 hours and told us that baby is moving , head not fixed etc and finally ended up doing C-section.
Doctor answers every query keenly and priovides a lot of morale support. She has huge amount of experience in he field which gives her an upper hand. I would recommend  Dr Mala Prakash anytime

1. Before the due date, on the 38th week we went to check for a leak as we observed some watery leak.  *** ******* ********* ** ** * ***** ***** *** asked us to admit for the delivery. However,  we saw no water leak thereafter and had to reject the delivery.  *** ****** ***** **** ******* *** ********* ****** *** ******** ** ***** *** ****** * **** ****** ****** **** * *** *********

But it was not the case . On the day of induction they did the induction for just 3 hours and told us that baby is moving , head not fixed etc and finally ended up doing C-section.

I'd visited to consult regarding vaginal itching and irritation. The doctor examined and prescribed medication.  When I asked for the reason of the problem, she said " because you are married" , the response was really unexpected and she didn't bother to respond to any other questions I asked. 
And there were 2 more junior doctors who were present in the consultation room while all this conversation was happening. It made me really uncomfortable.  
I am very disappointed and do not recommend this doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I found her as my angel who just waved at her wand and my wish came true. Yes money , waiting time and painful processors do take us on ride but she is so professional and passionate with her work I had the confidence in very few weeks that I will surely be blessed with a baby. Adding on to my luck I had twins. Most happiest couple now. I highly recommend. She is a doctor don't expect friendship from her. Allow her to do her job.

My appointment was at 7:45pm and I reached clinic at 7:40.. When confirmed about the appointment from the receptionist, he said I have to wait 45 minutes as Doctor came late at 7pm instead of 6pm. But when taken appointment it's the doctor's duty or clinic's responsibility to inform patient about this well in advance. In such painful condition how can they ask to wait for 45 minutes. Disappointed.

Waiting period is more.. every time they introduce new rule to book appointment.. the lady who takes appointment talk very rash as if they are giving some free service..  
with all this even after prior appointment also min waiting period is 1 hour. 
Not happy with overall clinic management.. If you want to really consult this Dr better go to other hospital where she consult instead of her clinic

Amazing, empathetic and super smart. I went to Dr.Mala prakash for some post delivery problem of my wife in JP nagar as the clinic is near to my place.I had a positive experience as well. She was very friendly and informative. They are quite busy and I had to set up an appointment for a regular check-up  in the morning itself, so I would say it good to visit to doctor after booking prior appointment. I would definitely recommend her.

I really cannot say enough good things about Dr.Mala prakash.  She was SO patient with all of my many questions and actually seemed eager to answer them (as opposed to some other doctors in my past.)  As far as she was examining me for my problem, well that was as quick and painless as it gets.  I have had a condition for sometime which, despite much research on  my part, hasn't been entirely clear to me.  Dr. Mala Prakash explained everything and left me feeling very empowered.

As far as the clinic staff goes - they were fine. It was a bit of a wait though. I must rate the non-medical staff; I would say that they are just fine. They do their jobs.

I visited to Dr mala prakash for my treatment And i found she has very sharp skills as soon as i have explained my problem to her she explained the cause of the problem. In consultation and treatment she is very experienced , sincere and professional. I was visited to her for two to three weeks and she has proscribed me few medications also . those medications did good work for me.The clinic itself has the pharmacy it self and patients use to purchase the medicines form there only.
My only concern i that they charge five hundred rupees consultation fee and i had done with urine test also so one hundred and fifty rupees i have paid extra so according to me there can be some negotiation for consultation fee if the patient is on follow up with the doctor. Otherwise every thing was good there. Clinic was cleanly maintained .

Other vise i was incredibly impressed with her kind, courteous and approachable professionalism.  I am so very happy to have found such wonderful doctors. I know this will be a relationship of trust. Dr. Mala is  truly the most amazing doctor out there she is extremely patient, knowledgeable and kind.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ** *** ** *** **** ******* The way she explains our health issues without putting us in tension the confirmation she gives us is so satisfactory makes a patient  healthy and feels we shall be fine soon. I came from uae for the treatment with in a month I feel better flying back healthy and happy. God bless Dr. Mala

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** ****** *******, she is to the point, tells clearly when you ask right questions.
Patient enough to answer queries.
Don't expect her to tell you everything, kind enough to give all required details.
I was recommended to her by a friend, and I recommend her too.

Doctor was so patience to listen all my health issues and guide me properly. She was friendly treating. Well staff good maintenance safety precautions  was taken for COVID. But more time for scanning. Mala prakash was very good to me hoping I will get good results  for my treatment

I have been regularly seeing Dr Mala Prakash from my pregnancy days. Now I am 50 and I find her medical advice and treatments very assuring and have been advised well for any issue that I have had. I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone wanting medical treatment and advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ********* ******* She handled my delivery.Listens patiently to concerns. Does not push for unnecessary tests or csec.Wait times can be high some days as she is a busy doctor. But she sees patients as late as 10 pm at her clinic without turning down anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We came to mala mam with no or very less hope.
We had already consulted few doctors in town on our infertility issue and lost hopes.
I had very low AMH value and due to few other complications we couldn't have natural conception.

Mam has good knowledge and also patiently explained us all the options. We were adviced for IVF. At every point you are given all available options and also told about the probability and risks. This is something I respect a lot in mam. No false hopes and you are told things as it is. 
Luckily by God's grace and mam's treatment we got pregnant.  Last June delivered a baby girl.  Thanks a lot for this precious gift for our lifetime mam. You are always in our prayers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Mala is a very experienced Gynaecologist for sure.I had taken my wife to Apollo Hospitals from Feb 2018 till delivery.Everything taken care by the doctor till my child birth at Apollo.She is a very proffessional and knows her work at the back of her hand.She had suggested all proper medicines,dosage and tests for my wife.She was instrumental is a very satisfactory experience in having my wife's prenatal and C section delivery successfully.The medicines she gave never had any side reaction and the food she suggested has always helped to.increase her haemoglobin . If you wish to have a child she is the perfect doctor to consult with.God Bless her always with success.Thanks doctor.

I like this doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
If i talk about doctor knowledge, I am pretty satisfied with.
Waiting time was too much. I had waited for more than 1.5 hours. I am not sure if its usual or due to some emergency.
Medications prescribed are to the point or we can see useful. No extra medicines but medicine written for only 2 brands.

Overall what matters is doctor knowledge and experience. That's satisfied.

The doctor is really good but I am really not happy with her explanations because she comes very late and then rushes to see the patients. In this process she fails to speak to her patients properly. It would b great if she can give more time to listen to her patients rather than just rushing it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Mala mam for pre-pregnancy health issues till safe delivery,she really has god power in her hand,best part is -she prescribes only the exact require treatment/medicine, upto the point *** ******* *** ** *** **** ****** *** Dr Nikita prakash is also very good ,both are very patience in listening to patient queries and best in analysing the problems,very  comfortable consulting them and to get treated. Wish to get treated by her even for my second pregnancy.

First  of all she arrived late and on top of that she  was getting annoyed for everything. 
*** ******* **** *** ** **** ** *** ******** ** ***** We saw her ratings in Google and went to the clinic but wudnt recommend her to anyone as a person should be first polite to people **** ***** *** **** *******
Never seen a rude doctor like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
From start of pregnancy till delivery, which was normal had very good experience. Unlike present doctors who push for C section this doctor was genuine in suggestions, minimal medicines & accurate guidance depending on the context of patient.
Nowadays doctor talk more than required & display all time. This doctor does her profession in its true form not requiring any additional qualities.

She was more than a doctor for me , a guide i consulted her just one day before my delivery as the doctor i was consulting went abroad. She took my case n the very next day delivered my baby . Shes like an angel fr me 
I thank god and my friend who told me about Dr Mala.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a very well experienced doctor with a high curing percentage. I have been to her many times and can say that she does not prescribe unnecessary high dosage medicines. She keeps the treatment very simple as much as possible until a major intervention is required. A very good doctor and someone I can blindly rely on. She is an expert gynecologist.

*** **** ******* ** ******** She is very loving, caring and polite, thus making  the journey of pregnancy a very pleasant one.
With a responsible doc like her by the side, one cane be worry free. I have been to many Gyanecologists but none like her.

It was nice. She is a very good doctor. She listen very carefully. Staffs are very good.
I will recommend to others.
Doctor's Suggestion, Advice & the way she treats is really great & makes us feel comfortable. She carries a smile which makes us feel energetic

Dr. MALA was very patient friendly. She gives enough comfort in freely expressing our problem. 
She is good at remembering patient's history n prescribing medicines accordingly.

She is very satisfying. Really happy:) She gives a very professional consultation with regards to pregnancy..and this being my first pregnancy I have been a lot curious n worried bout small things but the doc has put all my worries to rest.

Practo did not coordinate with the clinic. They start at 5:30, not at 5. I saw the doctor at about 6:20 p.m

The doctor is very patient. Listened carefully. And i did not feel uncomfortable at all. Normally, doctors cpnclude without listening. She listened. Very good doctor.

Excellent experienced doctor...knows her job well.
Know her since 10 yrs now..
Nice treatment. Still more explanation and guidance would help more like food and fruits consumption during pregnancy.
